get_blog_info_by_url.description: Retrieves public information about a Blogger blog given its URL. ONLY works for allowed, pre-configured domains.

blog_url.description: The full URL of the blog (e.g., 'https://yourcompanyblog.blogspot.com').

get_latest_posts_by_blog_url.description: Fetches the most recent public blog posts for a specified blog URL. Optionally fetches full content for the knowledge base. ONLY works for allowed, pre-configured domains.

blog_url.description: The full URL of the blog.

num_posts.description: The maximum number of posts to retrieve (default is 3).

include_content.description: Whether to fetch full post content and add to the knowledge base (default is false).
